description: The Creative Writing Podcast at AmericanWriters.com is designed to help writers of all levels. The focus is on characterization, narrative, plot development, dialogue, conflict, setting, literary archetypes, etc. Episodes are not centered around mindless, useless pep talks and recycled writing tips. Rather, the Podcast at AmericanWriters.com offers in-depth analysis of what works and what doesn't, with explanations and original writing samples. Subscribe and visit AmericanWriters.com for more information.
title: AmericanWriters.com -- Creative Writing Podcast

episodes.title: Writing Deus Ex Machina (Not!)
episodes.description: Learn about Deus Ex Machina -- its pros and cons and how it can hurt fiction.

episodes.title: Motives Beneath Motives
episodes.description: This episode doesn't just talk about what superficially motivates characters; it looks at the forces that need to stir at deeper levels.

episodes.title: Writing a Novel Prologue
episodes.description: Many authors are disparaged for using prologues to start their novels -- but is it such a bad practice after all?

episodes.title: Story, Narrative and What to Include
episodes.description: Trim down your writing; think about what you should include in your narrative and what should you leave out. Also, learn the difference between story and narrative.

episodes.title: Writing, Ideology and Activism
episodes.description: Many writers use their fiction as a form of activism. However, does it hurt the art form?

episodes.title: How People Read
episodes.description: Learn about the four ways to approach reading a book.

episodes.title: The Subtle Dimensions of External Conflict
episodes.description: Learn how external conflict can be written to underscore the turmoil brewing within the character's psyche.

episodes.title: Quick Writing Tip 008 -- How Writing is like Painting
episodes.description: Learn how writing is like painting a picture. However, this episode is not what you think; it has nothing to do with writing description. Give it a listen.

episodes.title: Quick Writing Tip 007 -- Be Consistent
episodes.description: Make your characters consistent. Learn how things can easily go wrong.

episodes.title: Quick Writing Tip 006 -- Sacrifice for the Greatest Good
episodes.description: Stop being so sentimental. If it serves your story, kill the characters you love.

episodes.title: AmericanWriters.com Podcast Promo
episodes.description: Subscribe to the Podcast at AmericanWriters.com.

episodes.title: The Story or You?
episodes.description: Step outside of yourself -- Stop making all your fiction thinly-veiled autobiography.

episodes.title: What's this Adverb Phobia all About?
episodes.description: Should we be afraid of adverbs? Sometimes, yes. Listen to this and learn why.

episodes.title: Likeable Characters
episodes.description: Okay, write that hateful character -- but make sure that he is loveable.

episodes.title: Write what you know?? Nonsense!
episodes.description: Stop writing what you KNOW and start using your imagination!

episodes.title: The Importance of Internal Conflict
episodes.description: Yes, internal conflict is the heart of characterization; but it's also at the heart of drama. Listen and learn.
